name: VolleyBall 3D
description:
Play with a friend or AI, customize the game rules and controls to your liking!

There are 4 parameters available to choose from to customize the game: character speed, number of rounds, pause time after winning a round, and number of ball touches. 

There are 2 modes available in the game: against artificial intelligence, or against another player. 

Very flexible control settings, to choose from, there are 6 control options available individually for each player.
